talk_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>This is the Garden of Time.<sp:0:4:0>My records indicate that Princess Zelda is
waiting at the location marked on the <clr:0000>map<clr:ffff>
found in the pad.
talk_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Happy>Yes. This is the <clr:0000>Garden of Time<clr:ffff>.<sp:5:1:0>
The structure visible to the north is
the <clr:0000>Temple of Time<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0>It was used in the distant past. <sp:5:0:0>Many rites
and ceremonies of the kingdom were
held there.<sp:0:4:0>Now it is a lonely place. No one visits.<sp:0:4:0>Apologies. I cannot help but reminisce.
talk_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive>Head to the indicated location. Take care
as you do so.
